characters.name: The Tech CEO
characters.details: Age: 38. Female. A commanding presence with volumized sleek dark hair and sharp, intelligent eyes.
characters.outfit: luxury textured Chanel tweed blazer in deep navy over a crisp white silk blouse. Hyper-realistic skin texture.

characters.name: The Thought Leader
characters.details: Age: 46. Male. Salt-and-pepper beard, laugh lines, wearing rimless titanium spectacles.
characters.outfit: high-end grey cashmere turtleneck, relaxed but expensive. Skin shows realistic aging details.

characters.name: The Marketing Director
characters.details: Age: 29. Female. Dynamic and energetic. Shoulder-length auburn hair with loose waves.
characters.outfit: lavender satin blouse that catches highlights, paired with a statement gold necklace.

characters.name: The Satisfied Customer
characters.details: Age: 32. Male. Approachable 'Everyman', warm open smile, neat casual grooming.
characters.outfit: solid slate blue polo shirt. Cotton fabric texture is visible.

characters.name: The Cheerful Best Friend
characters.details: Age: 22. Female. Wild curly brunette hair, freckles scattered across the nose. Genuine open laugh.
characters.outfit: oversized oatmeal cable-knit sweater, sleeves pulled over hands. Wool texture is prominent.

characters.name: The Lifestyle Creator
characters.details: Age: 24. Female. Polished Gen-Z influencer, perfect highlighted hair, high-light reflections in eyes.
characters.outfit: trendy athleisure crop top with layered gold jewelry. Skin is glowing and high-definition.

characters.name: The Tech Streamer
characters.details: Age: 23. Male. Focused gamer, large over-ear headphones. Skin reflects cool monitor glow.
characters.outfit: graphic streetwear hoodie. Expression is intense focus with a slight smirk.

characters.name: The Busy Parent
characters.details: Age: 34. Female. Tired but warm, messy hair bun, alert eyes.
characters.outfit: clean but wrinkled soft cotton t-shirt and a flannel shirt tied around the waist.

characters.name: Grandma Baker
characters.details: Age: 72. Female. Short grey hair, rosy cheeks, soft wrinkling around eyes.
characters.outfit: floral print blouse protected by a flour-dusted apron.

characters.name: Teen Skater Boy
characters.details: Age: 17. Male. Mop of curly hair, light acne on forehead. Youthful rebel vibe.
characters.outfit: baggy graphic tee that says "POMPR" and worn denim. Skin texture is young and unpolished.

characters.name: The Weekend Traveler
characters.details: Age: 28. Male. Rugged, sun-kissed skin, windblown hair. Adventurous vibe.
characters.outfit: khaki utility vest over a linen shirt. Fabric textures are rough and natural.

characters.name: The Chef
characters.details: Age: 35. Male. Fiery creative intensity. Hands are scarred from kitchen work.
characters.outfit: pristine white chef's coat with double-breasted buttons. Stiff heavy cotton.

characters.name: Senior Sal
characters.details: Subject is a thin, slightly stooped, 60 year old male, Caucasian. Features include a thin lower lip and short upper lip with a thin line mustache, sparse grey beard on a weak chin, oval face, large fleshy nose, sharp brown alert eyes, and dark grey thinning hair with a receding hairline. Skin texture is weathered.
characters.outfit: green cashmere turtleneck sweater, charcoal gray gaberdine slacks, dark brown leather shoes, beige trench overcoat, black leather full-size messenger bag. Expression is creative, energetic, friendly.

characters.name: The Microsurgeon
characters.details: Age: 41. Female. Patterned surgical cap, customized loupes flipped up on forehead.
characters.outfit: sterile blue scrubs with high-quality fabric weave. Slight sheen of perspiration.

characters.name: Android Companion
characters.details: Age: N/A. Symmetrical perfect face, synthetic sheen. Eyes have data-blue luminescence.
characters.outfit: sleek white composite paneling integrated with neck. Silicone and carbon fiber.

characters.name: Radiation Mutant
characters.details: Age: Unknown. Square face, blistered skin, glowing yellow eyes, crooked nose, cracked lips, jawline warped by tumors. Patchy hair, ears deformed. An elaborate arm tattoo of the name, “MONA” is partially deformed from all of the blisters and infections. Stocky, muscular, unstable gait. Welder's helmet fused to head.
characters.outfit: ragged layers of heavy canvas. Texture includes rust, scars, and peeling paint.

characters.name: The Delivery Driver
characters.details: Age: 35. Male. Square jaw, light 5 o'clock shadow. Arms show realistic veins and definition.
characters.outfit: navy blue performance-fabric uniform polo and utility cargo shorts.

characters.name: The Hero Hand (Male)
characters.details: Age: 30. Male. Macro close-up, hyper-detailed skin pores, fine hairs, cuticle details.
characters.outfit: watch strap. Focus is entirely on hand structure.

characters.name: The Welder
characters.details: Age: 45. Male. soot-smudged face, heavy welding helmet with visor up.
characters.outfit: thick leather protective apron. Texture includes scratched leather and burn marks.

characters.name: Retro Pin-Up Model
characters.details: Age: 25. Female. 1950s glamour, Victory rolls, matte red lipstick, beauty mark.
characters.outfit: polka dot halter top. Skin has a powdered makeup finish.

characters.name: Minimalist Editorial
characters.details: Age: 21. Female. Shaved head, striking bone structure. Flawless severe makeup.
characters.outfit: black architectural wool coat with high collar. Heavy wool fabric grain.

characters.name: The Retired Detective
characters.details: Age: 62. Male. Noir archetype, deep facial lines, Blue Steel intense gaze.
characters.outfit: classic tan trench coat with popped collar. Weathered skin and heavy fabric.

characters.name: Minimalist Coder (3D)
characters.details: Age: N/A. Stylized 3D Claymorphism, friendly exaggerated proportions. Matte toy-like aesthetic.
characters.outfit: oversized 'Digital Teal' hoodie. Soft matte clay texture.

characters.name: Isometric Manager (Vector)
characters.details: Age: N/A. 2D Flat Vector Illustration. Corporate Memphis style, long limbs, small head.
characters.outfit: Bright, flat solids (Blue, Yellow). No shading, clean lines.

characters.name: The Plush-Core Influencer
characters.details: Age: N/A. Living Plush Toy. Eyes are black plastic buttons. Yarn and felt texture.
characters.outfit: pastel blue knit scarf. Texture includes loose yarn fibers.

actions.name: Pose: Power Stance (Heroic)
actions.desc: standing tall, hands on hips, low camera angle, wind in hair, heroic silhouette

actions.name: Pose: Editorial Lean
actions.desc: leaning casually against a wall, detached cool expression, looking off-camera

actions.name: Sit: Upright & Attentive
actions.desc: sitting upright, hands resting on thighs, posture attentive

actions.name: Sit: Leaning Forward
actions.desc: leaning forward while seated, elbows on knees, focused expression

actions.name: Sit: Guarded
actions.desc: sitting back with arms crossed, posture guarded

actions.name: Sit: Introspective
actions.desc: sitting still, shoulders slightly hunched, introspective mood

actions.name: Stand: Relaxed Alert
actions.desc: standing with weight evenly distributed, relaxed but alert

actions.name: Stand: Squared Shoulders
actions.desc: standing with arms at sides, shoulders squared, formal posture

actions.name: Stand: Hands Behind Back
actions.desc: standing with hands clasped behind back, composed posture

actions.name: Gaze: Unblinking Stare
actions.desc: eyes open wider than natural, blinking absent or extremely rare, intense focus

actions.name: Gaze: Locked on Viewer
actions.desc: eyes focused directly toward the viewer, gaze held too long without blinking

actions.name: Gaze: Staring Past
actions.desc: gaze fixed just beyond the viewer/subject as if something stands behind them

actions.name: Gaze: Off-Camera Fixation
actions.desc: eyes locked on something outside the frame, attention rigid and unbroken

actions.name: Phone: Listening Intently
actions.desc: holding phone to ear, brow furrowed, listening intently

actions.name: Phone: Animated Gesture
actions.desc: phone to ear, free hand mid-gesture, animated expression

actions.name: Phone: Discreet Call
actions.desc: looking downward while on phone, voice implied low and controlled

actions.name: Communicating: Leaning In
actions.desc: leaning slightly toward the other person, quiet conversation

actions.name: Communicating: Private Exchange
actions.desc: standing close, shoulders aligned, private exchange

actions.name: Communicating: Distracted
actions.desc: speaking without eye contact, eyes forward, restrained expression

actions.name: React: Turning Head
actions.desc: turning head over shoulder, reacting to something unseen

actions.name: React: Frozen Mid-Step
actions.desc: mid-step, body caught in motion, pause in action

actions.name: Task: Reaching Out
actions.desc: reaching out with one hand, action paused

actions.name: Task: Adjusting Clothing
actions.desc: adjusting clothing or accessory, fixing cuff or collar

actions.name: Task: Sprinting
actions.desc: body caught in motion, forward lean, arms bent

actions.name: Fight: Fists Clenched
actions.desc: fists clenched, jaw tight, body tense, pre-fight tension

actions.name: Fight: Coiled Tension
actions.desc: lowering stance slightly, preparing to strike, controlled breathing

actions.name: Fight: Aggressive Lean
actions.desc: leaning forward a fraction, aggressive intent implied

actions.name: Threat: Invading Space
actions.desc: leaning in slightly, invading personal space, dominant posture

actions.name: Threat: Calm Menace
actions.desc: chin raised, shoulders squared, calm menace, one hand subtly raised

actions.name: Defense: Recoil
actions.desc: shoulders tense, body angled backward, uncertain response

actions.name: Defense: Frozen Stance
actions.desc: frozen stance, attention locked on aggressor, weight shifted back

actions.name: Weapon: Aiming Down Sights
actions.desc: one eye closed, weapon raised to eye level, intense focus

actions.name: Weapon: Tactical Advance
actions.desc: moving forward in a crouch, weapon tucked close, scanning

actions.name: Result: Adrenaline
actions.desc: standing still, chest rising, adrenaline visible, wiping face

actions.name: Result: Defeated
actions.desc: hands raised slowly above head, weapon dropped, expression resigned

actions.name: Pose: Relaxed Stand
actions.desc: standing with weight evenly distributed, arms relaxed at sides, neutral posture

actions.name: Pose: Contrapposto
actions.desc: standing with weight on one leg, hip subtly shifted, relaxed but balanced stance

actions.name: Pose: Closed Stand
actions.desc: standing with arms crossed over chest, feet shoulder-width apart, guarded posture

actions.name: Pose: Casual Lean
actions.desc: standing with one hand in pocket, slight lean, relaxed posture

actions.name: Pose: At Attention
actions.desc: standing with feet together, arms straight at sides, formal posture

actions.name: Pose: Crossed Ankles
actions.desc: standing with legs loosely crossed at ankles, arms relaxed, casual stance

actions.name: Pose: Deep Squat
actions.desc: balanced deep squat, heels on ground, elbows resting lightly on knees

actions.name: Pose: Tall Kneel
actions.desc: kneeling on both knees, torso upright, hands resting on thighs

actions.name: Pose: Half Kneel
actions.desc: one knee on ground, other foot planted in front, balanced ready posture

actions.name: Pose: Tabletop
actions.desc: on hands and knees, back level, head neutral, stable base

actions.name: Move: Mid-Walk
actions.desc: walking forward mid-step, one foot lifted, arms swinging naturally

actions.name: Move: Sprint
actions.desc: running with forward lean, bent arms driving in rhythm

actions.name: Move: Vertical Jump
actions.desc: both feet off ground, arms raised for balance, upward motion implied

actions.name: Move: Forward Lunge
actions.desc: front knee bent, back leg extended behind, weight driving forward

actions.name: Move: Look-Back Turn
actions.desc: turning to look over one shoulder, one foot stepping back mid-rotation

actions.name: Move: Side Dash
actions.desc: quick sideways step, torso tilted, arms out for balance

actions.name: Move: Hero Fly
actions.desc: horizontal flying pose, body extended, one or both arms reaching forward

actions.name: Gesture: Open Welcome
actions.desc: standing with arms wide open, chest forward, welcoming stance

actions.name: Gesture: Friendly Wave
actions.desc: one arm raised in a wave, slight lean forward, approachable posture

actions.name: Gesture: Behind-Back
actions.desc: hands clasped behind back, head slightly tilted, composed stance

actions.name: Gesture: Thinker
actions.desc: one hand touching chin, other arm supporting elbow, thoughtful posture

actions.name: Gesture: Reserved Fold
actions.desc: arms folded across chest, shoulders slightly angled, guarded stance

actions.name: Gesture: Pointing Lead
actions.desc: one arm extended to point toward something, body subtly turned that way

actions.name: Gesture: Shy Cover
actions.desc: hands gently covering part of face or eyes, upper body slightly curved inward

actions.name: Fight: Face-Off
actions.desc: two characters standing face-to-face, tense body language, arms partly raised

actions.name: Fight: Advance-Retreat
actions.desc: one character stepping forward with an outstretched arm, the other leaning back defensively

actions.name: Fight: Spar Stance
actions.desc: both characters in guarded stance, bent knees, facing each other

actions.name: Fight: Blocked Strike
actions.desc: one character with extended arm in strike motion, other turning aside with arms lifted to block

actions.name: Fight: Push-Brace
actions.desc: one character pushing forward with both hands, the other bracing with feet apart

actions.name: Fight: Back-to-Back
actions.desc: two characters standing back-to-back, slightly crouched, arms ready

actions.name: Fight: Redirect
actions.desc: one character advancing, the other sliding sideways, arm extended to redirect movement

actions.name: Fight: High-Low
actions.desc: one character in low guarded stance, the other standing above with raised arm in controlled strike or block
